value:
Your divine weapon is so cool!
Hunting and summoning are kind of
similar, now that I think about it.$k$pYou'll never know who—or what—
you'll encounter!

I grew up surrounded by nature. It
was great playing in the mountains
every day.$k$pOh, I don't mean to say being here
isn't a lot of fun too! Because it is!

Tell me right away if you find yourself
in trouble. I've got keen eyes so I can
help out no matter where I am!

Want to join me for target practice?
If you can hit a bullseye, maybe it'll
improve your summoning!

I'm not great at studying, but I try my
best. Hunting skills alone won't make
for a strong royal.$k$pI've gotta devote myself fully if I want
to take after my dad!

This place looks like a lot of fun! Oh,
I've come to say hello. I was sent
by $Nf!
Wow! I feel like I'm ready for anything!
A little bit better than yesterday...
Eh, I'm good enough the way I am!

I want to show this new power to
Dad. Think he'd be proud of me?

It's good to meet you! My name's
Kiragi. My dad is Takumi, and I love
him to death! I love hunting too!$k$pSay, we should go hunting together!

Wow, you've come to see me? I had
a feeling something good would
happen today!$k$pI hope great things like this keep
happening. That would eventually
bring the world to peace, right?$k$pI was raised in the Deeprealms, but I
knew there was a war raging in the
outside world.$k$pThings must have been really tough
for my parents. I just hate how war is
so hard on everyone...$k$pThat's why I want to work to bring
peace to all worlds. Hoshido, Nohr,
and now Askr...$k$pI want to turn them all into kingdoms
where the only things that happen are
great things!$k$pAnd with you by my side, I think I can
make that dream come true.
No more Mr. Nice Guy!
Here goes!
War is heck!
Bullseye!
Did what I could...
Who's the man! That was an amazing hunt!
♪Hm-hm-hm...♪Another day, another chance for some fun. Let's go!
When you get done with your Order of Heroes stuff, want to head up to the mountains with me? We could get some hunting in.
My dad is the best. Seriously. So amazing.
If I believe something will go well, it does!
One day, I'll wield the Fujin Yumi. But when?
Thanks for summoning me. I know what I'm good at, and I'll take care of what needs taking care of.
Oh, yeah!
Kiragi's here!
So ready!
